css: .qs-snippet-card { max-width: 350px; background: #fff; border-radius: 8px; box-shadow: 0 2px 8px rgba(0,0,0,0.1); overflow: hidden; } .qs-snippet-card-img { width: 100%; height: auto; display: block; } .qs-snippet-card-body { padding: 1.5rem; } .qs-snippet-card-title { margin: 0 0 0.75rem; color: #333; } .qs-snippet-card-text { margin: 0 0 1rem; color: #666; line-height: 1.5; } .qs-snippet-btn { display: inline-block; padding: 0.5rem 1rem; border: none; border-radius: 4px; font-size: 0.9rem; text-decoration: none; cursor: pointer; } .qs-snippet-btn-primary { background: #007bff; color: #fff; } .qs-snippet-btn-primary:hover { background: #0056b3; }
